timeline.bodyHTML:
@olegmoz we can extract this part to a private method to avoid code duplication:

this.repo().thenApply(
   map -> Objects.requireNonNull(map.string(${param}), ${message})
)
timeline.author: Vatavuk

timeline.body: @olegmoz  let's extract `NuGet` creation to a private method to make code more readable
timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz  let's extract NuGet creation to a private method to make code more readable

timeline.body: @olegmoz  I would also extract `php` creation part to a private method to make code more readable
